changes.rscadd: add: Made the vampire progeny tip change depending on if you can or can't rise more.
Vampires can now tell the difference between Vampire Spawn, Vampires and Wretch Vampires on examine.

changes.code_imp: Fixed a variable typo for clan covens.

changes.bugfix: Fixed Vampire Spawn not having their own icon as they expected.
Fixed being able to spawn as a vampire when playing churchling.
